attributes.action: No further increases to taxes or means testing to state pension.
attributes.background: Give business and families certainty. So they can plan for the future

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you do not want the Government to raise taxes, but we do not know which taxes you mean.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Stop Means Testing Pensioners and increase the State Pension
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700120
